summary: The Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency (MIGA) operates under the auspices of the United Nations, providing political risk insurance and credit enhancement to facilitate foreign direct investment in developing countries. In the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, MIGA plays a pivotal role in promoting sustainable development and investment stability. By mitigating risks associated with expropriation, currency transfer restrictions, and civil unrest, MIGA enhances the attractiveness of investment opportunities. The EU recognizes MIGAâ€™s contributions to fostering economic growth and stability, aligning with its own objectives of promoting international cooperation and sustainable development through strategic partnerships and investment facilitation.
